## ResourceManager.fetchMaterial() method

Load a material by ID and track the allocation for reverse lookup.

**Signature:**

```typescript
fetchMaterial<T extends Material = MeshMaterial>(id: string): Promise<T>;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

id


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

Material identifier or path.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;T&gt;

A Promise resolving to the loaded material, or `null` if failed.
